attributes.action: push for Jose Mourinho to be made the next manager of the England football team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe Jose Mourinho has the charisma, leadership skills and tactical nous to lead England from the football wilderness.
Jose has a proven track record of winning trophies with Chelsea and Porto and admits he would love to be England coach.
It’s time the Special One was given this special job.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
